page.title: 12TELEVISION IN WINTER
page.content: Television is enjoyed mainly in the Winter by the adults in the area, but all year round by the children with the average viewing time being l8 hours a week. Documentaries, wild life programmes and "soaps" such as Dallas, Dynasty and Crossroads prove to be the most popular viewing. Due to the lack of shops in the area, newspapers, magazines and comics are only bought on the once or twice weekly shopping trips, or when the children are transported to School. It was surprising to find many inhabitants never purchased a newspaper, relying on the T.V. for a round-up of the days events.
